name: planet-commercetools-connector
description: The connector between Datatrans and ConnerceTools to hide Datatrans from the consumer

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile
scripts.package: cd dist && rm -rf ./package/$STAGE && cp ../serverless.yml . && ln -sf ../node_modules . && serverless package --stage $STAGE --region $AWS_REGION --verbose --package ./package/$STAGE/
scripts.package:local-dev: cross-env STAGE=local-dev AWS_REGION=local-fake-region npm run package
scripts.package:aws-dev: cross-env STAGE=v1 AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 npm run package
scripts.test:local-dev:all: npm run lint && cross-env npm run test:base -- --silent=false --verbose
scripts.start:local-dev: cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 NODE_OPTIONS="-r dotenv/config" ts-node-dev --project ./tsconfig.json --respawn -- $(which sls) offline --stage local-dev --region us-east-1
